dialogues.text: My mining equipment was stolen. Please, help me get it back!

options.text: Do you have any idea who might have done it?
Is there anyone who might have seen it happen?

dialogues.text: I don't know. I was meeting some friends in the Town Hall last night and when I came back, some equipment was missing from my cart.
You could ask some people around the town square. They might have seen something.
Oh, you found my equipment! Thank you so much. Some thugs stole it? I'm glad you got rid of them then!
Please, take this pickaxe as a reward.
Hello again. Thanks for helping out earlier! You are always welcome here in Shamrock Town.
